response.original_title: Upside Down (紅鼻子醫生與朋友們的旅程)
response.overview: In Taiwan, there is a group of clown artists whose stage is not in a theater, but in hospitals. They are not doctors, yet they bring healing through physical theater performances. These “clown doctors,” with their signature red noses, bring laughter and music into the cold, clinical environment of hospitals, offering moments of relief and emotional comfort to patients, families, and healthcare workers alike.
response.title: Upside Down (A Journey of Dr. Red Noses and Their Friends)
